subject: Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: American men will not crack the top 20 of the next ATP rankings, a first in the rankings history, and an exodus sealed when No. 20 John Isner lost his Rogers Cup opener.
snippet: American men will not crack the top 20 of the next ATP rankings, a first in the rankings history, and an exodus sealed when No. 20 John Isner lost his Rogers Cup opener.
